sense.name: add up, amount to, sum up, tally
sense.examples: His medical bills totaled just under $500. In the end, the export totaled 28.6 thousand tons. The length of the object totals 2.7 meters. Present the coupon before they total your bill. Total the number of hours you spent working on this project.

sense.name: damage beyond the point of repair
sense.examples: My son totaled our new car. The rock start totals his guitar at every concert.
